Name: BRDG
About the game: BRDG is a puzzle game about pushing blocks and making bridges. Blocks can be part of a group and that group will move together when pushed. In later levels, blocks can be added or removed from a group. Can you make a bridge to the end in all 28 levels? Keyboard Controls Menu Select: Enter or Space Move: WASD or Arrow Keys Undo: U or Z Reset: R Back: Esc or B The game will also attempt to automatically configure gamepad controls if one is plugged in before running the game.
Meta Title: BRDG: Jun 19, 2020, Robert Alvarez and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on BRDG? Check out the release date (Jun 19, 2020), developer insights from Robert Alvarez, and a complete game summary.
